item.title: 【HD Live Performances】HDTV - Carly Rae Jepsen - NHK Hall, Tokyo, Japan, 07-10-2019 [1080p59.94] - caladan
item.description:
Here is an amazing recording (broadcasted on Japanese TV) of one of Carly's best shows. The source (a 6.3GB file from RuTracker) looked good but it was interlaced, had visible blocking and banding artifacts and had parts of a Carly interview inserted during the show. This release is a processed version by me (I put so much effort to get this right):
- edited with Avisynth: deinterlaced with QTGMC preset Slow for a smooth double frame rate, deblocked with Deblock_QED, debanded with neo_f3kdb;
- muxed with MKV ToolNix;
- demuxed with gMKVExtractGUI;
- added chapters for each song with MKV ToolNix;
- converted with FFmpeg.

I did quite many tests and I decided to use MP4 HEVC 10 bit (CRF 16) as the video format because it kept the quality high and prevented ugly banding. I also included an MP4 AVC version which is more compatible with older devices. I joined all interview parts into a separate file. The audio wasn't transcoded. I included a text file with the setlist.

This very fun show is a must-have for any pop fan.







Setlist:
1. No Drug Like Me
2. Emotion
3. Run Away With Me
4. Julien
5. (Happy Not Knowing)
6. Call Me Maybe
7. Now That I Found You
8. (Gimmie Love)
9. (Feels Right)
10. (Fever)
11. (First Time)
12. Want You in My Room
13. Store
14. Too Much
15. I Really Like You
16. (Everything He Needs)
17. Boy Problems
18. Party for One
19. Real Love
20. Let's Get Lost
21. Cut to the Feeling

Songs in brackets weren't broadcasted.
